body:
Greetings,


Using Radiance on a virtual machine and I am trying to run the scene0 tutorial.


$ rview -vf camera.vp test.oct


After entering this, the camera.vp file opens up in text editor and no image appears on the screen.
I had thought that things were installed proper because it has come this far but I am not for certain.


Your assistance is greatly appreciated.  Thank you.


Kevin
